        public static boolean deepEquals(boolean[] array1,
                 boolean[] array2)
        Compares the two boolean arrays deeply
        Parameters:
        array1 -
        array2 -
        Returns:
        false if arrays have different length or different values at a specific index, true otherwise

      • subArray

        public static java.lang.Object[] subArray(java.lang.Object[] data,
                          int startIndex,
                          int endIndex)
        Get a part on an array
        Parameters:
        data - The array to get the sub array from
        startIndex - The first index of the subarray
        endIndex - The first index not in the subarray (last index +1)
        Returns:
        an array with the elements from data in the fields startIndex to endIndex-1
